content: this soap sack pattern was created for crocheters who are part of s a c k **s**upporting **a** **c**ommunity with **k**indness a grassroots effort where people from all over the united states are crocheting and knitting soap sacks and donating them with a bar of soap in each one to homeless centers and food pantries follow us on our facebook page… https //www facebook com/soapsack/ any cotton or cotton blend yarn can be used
